thread.author: Johaness Getzner
thread.content: The whole street is covered by the water.

thread.author: Landeshauptstadt MÃ¼nchen
thread.content: A tree has fallen on the pavement. The emergency services are already on it.

thread.author: Mariz Awad
thread.content: A bottle fell from the garbage bin because of the wind and now all the glass is scattered on the ground. Be careful!
